Note
:  Use the provisions of
38 CFR 3.114(a)
to determine the effective date of a VA pension award payable concurrently with FEC when authorized solely by reason of the liberalizing VA regulation
at the request of the claimant or the claimant's representative, or
during a routine review of the claimant’s claims folder.
Important
:  There is
no
bar to concurrent payment of FEC and any VA benefit when entitlement is
not
based on the same disability or death per
38 CFR 3.708(b)(2)
.  However, FEC is countable as income for the purpose of determining entitlement to pension.
References
:  For more information on
the specific rules that apply to FEC and VA benefit elections, see
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, 5.2
, and
examples of cases involving an election of FEC and VA benefits, see
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, 5.4
.
